body_html:
Although installation is likely not going to work on ubuntu without the LD_PRELOAD workaround (see #2314), you may want to try the other of the two links provided on pytorch.org, i.e.:

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
body_text:
Although installation is likely not going to work on ubuntu without the LD_PRELOAD workaround (see #2314), you may want to try the other of the two links provided on pytorch.org, i.e.:
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
body:
Although installation is likely not going to work on ubuntu without the `LD_PRELOAD` workaround (see #2314), you may want to try the other of the two links provided on pytorch.org, i.e.:

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
